SimpleDatabaseInput.QueryString: SELECT vc.ipcode AS IPCODE FROM bp_ae.lw_pointtransaction pt INNER JOIN bp_ae.lw_pointevent pe ON pt.pointeventid = pe.pointeventid INNER JOIN bp_ae.lw_pointtype p ON pt.pointtypeid = p.pointtypeid INNER JOIN bp_ae.lw_virtualcard vc ON pt.vckey = vc.vckey INNER JOIN bp_ae.ats_memberdetails md ON vc.ipcode = md.a_ipcode INNER JOIN bp_ae.Lw_Loyaltymember lm ON vc.ipcode = lm.ipcode WHERE 1 = 1 AND ( (upper(trim(p.name)) IN ('AEO REWARDS BASE POINTS','AEO REWARDS BONUS POINTS','ADJUSTMENT POINTS', 'AEO REWARDS CS POINTS','ADJUSTMENT BONUS POINTS', 'WORLD SPEND POINTS') AND ((pt.transactiondate Between to_date('10/1/2015', 'mm/dd/yyyy') AND trunc(SYSDATE -14) AND pt.transactiontype = 1) OR (pt.transactiontype = 2)) ) OR (upper(trim(p.name)) IN ('BONUS POINTS') and pt.transactiondate Between to_date('10/1/2016', 'mm/dd/yyyy') AND trunc(SYSDATE -14))) AND AE_ISINPILOT(md.a_extendedplaycode) = 1 -- AEO-Point Conversion AND ((length(md.a_emailaddress) > 0) OR (nvl(md.a_pendingcellverification,1) = 0 AND length(md.a_mobilephone) > 0)) AND pt.pointsconsumed = 0 AND pt.transactiontype <> 4 AND pt.expirationdate > SYSDATE and vc.loyaltyidnumber in ('80004510923493') AND nvl(md.a_employeecode,0) != 1 AND nvl(md.a_employeecode,0) != 2 AND lm.memberstatus = 4 GROUP BY vc.ipcode HAVING SUM (pt.points) >= 1000
